item.description:
Time: 6pm

Place: Same place as the previous Halloween Party. We'll email all yay-sayers a week before the party.

This will be potluck. Bring food and drinks to share as we celebrate the season and our newfound / continued friendship we have with one another in the most secular way imaginable :)

Update: Darek has volunteered to be the head of the Solstice Swap. He will have more info on it at the December Meeting.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Saturnalia - Winter Solstice Celebration
